mapper.select: select I.item_name, I.item_price, I.item_main_photo, C.category_name, I.item_id from shop_item I join shop_category C on I.item_category = C.item_category where I.item_category = ${item_category}
select I.item_name, I.item_price, I.item_main_photo, I.item_id from shop_item I join shop_category C on I.item_category = C.item_category where I.item_category = ${item_category}
select N.option_name_values, O.option_name from shop_option_name N join shop_item_option O on N.option_name = O.option_name where O.item_id = #{item_id} and O.option_name = ${option_name}
select OD.option_value, O.option_name from shop_item_option O join shop_item_option_detail OD on O.item_option = OD.item_option where O.item_id = #{item_id} and O.option_name = ${option_name}
select I.item_id, P.item_photo, I.item_main_photo from shop_photo P join shop_item I on P.item_id = I.item_id where I.item_id = #{item_id}
